about.intro: Hi, I'm Suzeet, a software developer from Nepal. I have a passion for coding & I am always looking to leverage my programming skills as a developer. I love to learn new things and find ways to improve myself.
about.intro1: I have experience building websites, webApps and Android App. I am experienced as a front end developer with expertise on HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap, JS; and I have a well rounded knowledge of using Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator. I am also experienced with React, NextJS, NodeJS, ExpressJS, MongoDB and FireBase.
